entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
